summary: Changes the bound arrows to bound Glass arrows.
descriptionHtml:
I am no fan of the daedric or the bound arrows and so I decided to set the arrows of the bound bow to glass arrows. They are not the normal glass arrows, the damage is as high as that from the normal bound arrows and the bound glass arrows can not be found somewhere else in Skyrim except the bound bow spell.

It is just a little mod, but I hope you enjoy it
and sorry for my english :D
author: Jaycore
